borrow(uint256,uint256).details: Ledger decides whether or not to verify the stability of a secured loan or not.Loan history recorded on ledger.

params.bondAmount: Amount of bond to be collateralized.
Amount of bond that was entrusted as collateral.

repayAllAndUnstake(uint256).details: Unstake is executed after repay is executed.

params.bondAmount: Amount of bond you want to return.

repayAllAndUnstake(uint256).notice: Execute repayAll and unstake functions at the same time.

repayAndUnstake(uint256,uint256).notice: Execute repay and unstake functions at the same time.

stake(uint256).notice: Send token to bond contract, record on ledger.

stakeAndBorrow(uint256,uint256).notice: Execute stake and borrow functions at the same time.

unstake(uint256).notice: Execute unstake to get the entrusted token back.

unstakeInBond(uint256).notice: Execute unstake to get the bond back.
